trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class represents a set of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> objects.
<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> implements the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface.
Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class.

The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class.
An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class that represents the specified CMS/PKCS #7 recipient.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 CMS/PKCS #7 수신자를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 클래스의 인스턴스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class and adds the specified recipient.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> 생성자는 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만들고 지정된 수신자를 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration that specifies the type of subject identifier.
trans-unit.target: 주체 식별자의 형식을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> 열거형의 멤버입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection" /> collection that contains the certificates that identify the recipients.

The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> class and adds recipients based on the specified subject identifier and set of certificates that identify the recipients.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection)" /> 생성자는 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만들고 수신자를 식별하는 인증서 집합과 지정된 주체 식별자를 기준으로 수신자를 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> object that represents the recipient to add to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.

The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Add(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> method adds a recipient to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
If the method succeeds, the method returns an <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the zero-based position where the recipient is to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 메서드가 성공하면 이 메서드는 수신자의 삽입 위치(0부터 시작)를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 값을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the method fails, it throws an exception.
<paramref name="recipient" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Copies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection to an array.
An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object to which the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection is to be copied.
The zero-based index in <c>array</c> where the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection is copied.

The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" /> method copies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection to an array.
<paramref name="array" /> is not large enough to hold the specified elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" />가 지정된 요소를 보유할 수 있을 정도로 크지 않은 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="array" /> does not contain the proper number of dimensions.
<paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is outside the range of elements in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" />가 <paramref name="array" />의 요소 범위를 벗어난 경우

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> objects where the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection is to be copied.

The zero-based index for the array of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> objects in <c>array</c> to which the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection is copied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 컬렉션이 복사되는 <c>배열</c>에 포함된 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 개체의 배열에 대한 인덱스(0부터 시작)입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.CopyTo(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient[],System.Int32)" /> method copies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection to a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> array.
<paramref name="array" /> is not large enough to hold the specified elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" />가 지정된 요소를 보유할 수 있을 정도로 크지 않은 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="array" /> does not contain the proper number of dimensions.
<paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is outside the range of elements in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" />가 <paramref name="array" />의 요소 범위를 벗어난 경우

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Count" /> property retrieves the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션의 항목 수를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.GetEnumerator" /> method returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.

A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> object that can be used to enumerate the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> 컬렉션을 열거하는 데 사용할 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.IsSynchronized" /> property retrieves whether access to the collection is synchronized, or thread safe.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.IsSynchronized" /> 속성은 컬렉션에 대한 액세스가 동기화되어 스레드로부터 안전하게 보호되는지 여부를 검색합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <see langword="false" />, which means that the collection is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 항상 컬렉션이 스레드로부터 안전하지 않음을 나타내는 <see langword="false" />를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value of <see langword="false" />, which means that the collection is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션이 스레드로부터 안전하지 않음을 나타내는 <see langword="false" />의 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the index in the collection.
The index is zero based.

The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Item(System.Int32)" /> property retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Item(System.Int32)" /> 속성은 컬렉션의 지정된 인덱스에 있는 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 개체를 검색합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> object at the specified index.
The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.
trans-unit.target: 인수 값이 호출된 메서드로 정의한 허용 값 범위를 벗어난 경우

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> object that represents the recipient to remove from the collection.

The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.Remove(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient)" /> method removes a recipient from the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
<paramref name="recipient" /> is <see langword="null" />.

The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.SyncRoot" /> property retrieves an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> object used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.SyncRoot" /> 속성은 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 컬렉션에 대한 액세스를 동기화하는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 개체를 검색합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> object that is used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 컬렉션에 대한 액세스를 동기화하는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator" /> method returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.

A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> object that can be used to enumerate the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientEnumerator" /> 컬렉션을 열거하는 데 사용할 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipientCollection" /> 개체입니다.
